text: the hacky self-built workshop is all
technical staff it is not about becoming
a security professional it is about
teaching us the basic foundation of
skills that we need in order to identify
potential security problems if we can
spot security problems then we can build
systems that avoid them and this is the
real focus of the workshop you won't
become a security professional we aren't
going to spend two days retraining you
into a different field but we will learn
what we need in order to build a secure
system i hope you come and join us for
this two-day workshop at ndc and i hope
